div.p: The affirmative po≈øition, charge or impeachment; the in≈øtruments of cruelty are in their habitations; that is all the infernall affections of their mindes, all the externall Members of their bodies, and all the weaons of war that they were furni≈øhed with, were wholely converted to the acting cruelty, all were imployed by them to this end to execute this bloody de≈øigne.

div.head: The Application.
div.p: And have wee not them in our dayes who beare witne≈ø≈øe to this truth al≈øo, and who may be truely charged with this impeachment?
